meanings.def: to touch somebody with your lips as a sign of love or sexual desire or when saying hello or goodbye
examples: They stood in a doorway kissing (= kissing each other).
Do people in Britain kiss when they meet?
kiss somebody/something Go and kiss your mother goodnight.
He bent forward to kiss her cheek.
She kissed him on both cheeks.
He lifted the trophy up and kissed it.
He bent to kiss her again.
He kissed her long and hard on the mouth.
She let him kiss her lightly on the cheek.

meanings.def: to gently move or touch something
examples: The sunlight kissed the warm stones.

meanings.def: a way of referring to somebody talking publicly, usually for money, about a past sexual relationship with somebody famous
to be very nice to somebody in order to persuade them to help you or to give you something
to take away the pain of an injury by kissing it
examples: Come here and let me kiss it better.

meanings.def: to accept that you will lose something or be unable to do something
examples: Well, you can kiss goodbye to your chances of promotion.

idioms.def: a way of referring to somebody talking publicly, usually for money, about a past sexual relationship with somebody famous
to be very nice to somebody in order to persuade them to help you or to give you something

examples: Come here and let me kiss it better.

idioms.idiom: kiss something goodbye | kiss goodbye to something
idioms.def: to accept that you will lose something or be unable to do something
examples: Well, you can kiss goodbye to your chances of promotion.
Come here and give me a kiss!
a kiss on the cheek
We were greeted with hugs and kisses.
As the train drew away he blew her a kiss (= kissed his hand and pretended to blow the kiss towards her).
Brad and Sue exchanged a kiss.
Don't I get a kiss?
He gave his daughter a gentle kiss on the forehead.
I wanted to take him in my arms and shower him with kisses.
She returned his kiss with passion.
The kiss only lasted for a few moments.

meanings.def: an event that seems good, but is certain to make something else fail
examples: An award can be the kiss of death for a writer.
That TV commercial was the kiss of death to his career as a serious actor.

meanings.def: a method of helping somebody who has stopped breathing to breathe again by placing your mouth on theirs and forcing air into their lungs
to kiss somebody suddenly or secretly

meanings.def: a US heavy metal band which formed in 1972. Members of the band painted their faces, coloured their hair and performed in a wild way on stage. This included destroying guitars, breathing fire and letting false blood come from their mouths. Their albums have included KISS (1974), Unmasked (1980) and Carnival of Souls (1997).
